main.name: Somnath Paul
main.description: I am a UI/UX Designer, Web Developer and a Digital Artist.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Somnath! You might also know me as Co-Founder of CodersBake. I've been designing for over 1 years now. As a Graphic Designer I've worked with startups and like to work with large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming Designer. I've been also the Head Designer at Wibin Technology. I have been designing Logo, UI, Mockups, Web Designs, Digital Arts and many more.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me and get Awsome Designs!

work.title: Co-Founder
work.description: Graphic Designer building Logo, Website Design, Mockups and more.

work.title: Head Designer
work.description: Graphic Designer building Logo, Website Design and more.

testimonials.text: Wroking with Somanath has been a great experience. He never leaves a chance to shock us with his amazing designs and mockups.
Your unique perspective adds so much to our team. We are so grateful to have you with us!
